events.participants: Vice Chancellor, Registrar, QEC Staff, Program Team members, Principals & Directors of UE Campuses/Divisions.
events.purpose: Encouragement & appreciation of PT members by awarding them honorarium of Rs. 5000/- and Certificate of Appreciation.

events.title: Program Team Workshop
events.participants: PT members, QEC members, University Officials
events.purpose: To aware & train PT members about Self-Assessment, preparation of SA report and filling the SA proformas.

events.title: Assessment Team Workshop
events.participants: AT members, QEC members, University Officials
events.purpose: To train the AT members about assessment of the programs through SARs and submission of AT findings & Rubric Forms.

events.title: World Quality Day
events.participants: University Faculty Members, QEC Staff, Students, University Officials, Representatives from other Universities
events.purpose: To raise awareness of how quality approaches can make a tangible impact on educational organizations and to make collaboration in terms of quality of education with other Universities.

events.title: Seminar for Celebration of World Quality Day (21.12.2016)
speakers: Dr. Sajid Ali (Chairman, Quality & Productivity Society of Pakistan)
Prof. Dr. Rauf-i-Azam (Vice Chancellor, University of Education, Lahore)
events.audience: Director (Division of Science & Technology), Principal Township Campus, Director PHEC, Director Research and Faculty Members from all Divisions and Campuses of University.
events.host: Director QEC (Dr. Muhammad Mansha) and all QEC staff.
events.purpose: To promote the importance of Quality and the contribution it makes towards the growth and prosperity of nations.

events.title: Seminar on Celebration of World Quality Day (28.12.2016)
speakers: Dr. Cusrow J. Dubash (Vice Rector, Forman Christian College)
Prof. Dr. Rauf-i-Azam (Vice Chancellor, University of Education, Lahore)
Dr. Naveed A. Malik (Rector, Virtual University)
events.audience: All QEC staff from different Universities of Lahore, Faculty members of University of Education and Virtual University.
events.purpose: To stimulate critical thinking as to how QECs and faculty can develop the competence to meet challenges faced by Higher Education Institutions (HEIs) for producing effective graduates.
events.theme: Producing Effective Graduates: A Challenge for Quality Assurance in Higher Education

events.title: Awareness Seminar & Training Workshop of Program Teams (19.01.2017)
events.trainer: Dr. Muhammad Mansha (Director, Quality Enhancement Cell)
events.audience: 61 Program Team Members of all Campuses and Divisions of University of Education.
events.purpose: To aware and train PT members regarding implementation of Self-Assessment criteria on the selected program of respective campuses/divisions, preparation of SAR and filling the SA proformas.

events.title: Awareness Seminar & Training Workshop of Assessment Team (ATs) Regarding Implementation of Rubric Form (11.05.2017)
events.trainer: Dr. Muhammad Mansha (Director, Quality Enhancement Cell)
events.audience: 62 Assessment Team Members of all Campuses and Divisions of University of Education.
events.purpose: To train the AT members about the criteria set by HEC for assessment of the programs through SARs prepared by the program team members and submission of Rubric Score about the program.

events.title: Awareness Seminar & Training Workshop of Assessment Team (ATs) Regarding Formulation of AT-Findings (11.05.2017)
events.trainer: Dr. Muhammad Mansha (Director, Quality Enhancement Cell)
events.audience: 62 Assessment Team Members of all Campuses and Divisions of University of Education.
events.purpose: To train the AT members for preparation of the findings that they have observed regarding assessment of the program of respective campuses/divisions.

events.title: Training Workshop of Affiliated Colleges on Implementation of Minimum Quality Standards (11.07.2017)
speakers: Prof. Dr. Rauf-i-Azam (Vice Chancellor, University of Education, Lahore)
Dr. Muhammad Mansha (Director, Quality Enhancement Cell)
events.audience: Heads/Principals of Affiliated Colleges and Incharge Examinations.
events.purpose: To make affiliated colleges aware of how they can develop the competence to meet challenges faced by Higher Education Institutions (HEIs) for producing effective graduates by implementing Minimum Quality Standards.

events.title: Training Workshop of Program Team Members (27–28 February 2019)
events.participants: PT members, QEC members, University Officials
events.purpose: Quality Enhancement Cell organized a two-day workshop to train faculty members and assist departments, institutes, and centers in improving the quality of teaching and research compatible with international standards.

events.title: Training Workshop of Assessment Team Members (12–21 June 2019)
events.participants: AT members, QEC members, University Officials
events.purpose: A two-day training workshop was held at the Multipurpose Hall of the main campus and Multan Campus, hosted by the Quality Enhancement Cell (QEC).

events.title: Balochistan Education Endowment Fund (BEEF) Delegation Visit to Air University
events.description: A delegation from the Balochistan Education Endowment Fund (BEEF), led by Mr. Mohsin Qadeer, Team Leader of the Scholarship Scheme, recently visited Air University Islamabad Campus. Mr. Umair Ahmad, Deputy Director of Financial Operations and Business Development warmly welcomed and briefed the delegation.

events.title: MoU Signing Between Air University and EDUFI
events.description: EDUFI and Air University have signed a MoU for an innovative 'Study Now, Pay Later' plan to facilitate students for payment of their tuition fees through convenient monthly installments.

events.title: AIRTECH'2024
Air University Career Fair 2024
events.description: Air University's Career Fair 2024, organized by the Placement and Alumni Affairs team on March 07, 2024, was inaugurated by Air University Vice Chancellor Air Marshal Javaid Ahmed, HI (M) (RETD.), and Registrar Air Cdre (R) Abdul Wahab Motla, alongside distinguished guests from the Federation of Pakistan Chambers of Commerce & Industry.

events.title: 1st International Conference on Recent Trends in Statistics Data Analytics with Applications in Natural Sciences
Eduvision Session
events.description: Air University Islamabad recently hosted a dynamic seminar in collaboration with Eduvision, Pakistan's top educational information website. The seminar, organized by the Placement and Alumni Affairs team, centered on vital topics: job search strategies and market trends.

events.title: Huawei Fresh Blood Induction Drive 2024
events.description: Air University Islamabad recently hosted Huawei Technologies Pakistan's Fresh Blood Induction Drive 2024, organized by the Placement and Alumni Affairs team. The event included a session led by the Huawei Team, providing insights into the company and career opportunities.

events.title: CPD Courses 2024
Orientation Day Semester Fall 2024
events.description: Excitement filled the air as Air University welcomed new students on Fall 2024 Semester Orientation Day. Alumni shared their experiences and advice with eager new students ready to learn and grow.

events.title: Pakistan Cyber Security Challenge (PCC) 2024
events.description: The Pakistan Cyber Security Challenge (PCC) 2024, held at Air University Islamabad, brought together over 1,600 participants from more than 110 institutions to compete in Capture-the-Flag and the Cybersecurity Startup Ideas Cup. The event was graced by Air Marshal (R) Asad Lodhi and other dignitaries.
